-*,:after,:before{margin:0;padding:0;box-sizing:border-box}html{font-size:62.5%}body{padding:5em 1.5em 0;min-height:100vh;font-family:Poppins,sans-serif;background-color:#f0f0f0}.age-calc{aspect-ratio:1/1.2;padding:3em 1.5em;border-radius:25px;border-bottom-right-radius:30%;background-color:#fff;max-width:420px}.age-calc-form{position:relative;display:grid;grid-template-columns:repeat(3,1fr);grid-template-rows:repeat(3,min-content);gap:1em;padding-bottom:3em;border-bottom:1px solid #dbdbdb}.age-calc-form__error:first-of-type,.age-calc-form__input:first-of-type,.age-calc-form__label:first-of-type{grid-column:1/2}.age-calc-form__error:nth-of-type(2),.age-calc-form__input:nth-of-type(2),.age-calc-form__label:nth-of-type(2){grid-column:2/3}.age-calc-form__error:nth-of-type(3),.age-calc-form__input:nth-of-type(3),.age-calc-form__label:nth-of-type(3){grid-column:3/4}.age-calc-form__label{grid-row:1/2;font-size:1.4rem;text-transform:uppercase;color:#716f6f}.age-calc-form__input{-webkit-appearance:textfield;-moz-appearance:textfield;appearance:textfield;grid-row:2/3;padding:.4em;width:100%;font-size:1.6rem;font-weight:700;color:#141414;background-color:transparent;border:1px solid #dbdbdb;border-radius:5px;outline:none;transition:border .3s;cursor:pointer}.age-calc-form__input:focus,.age-calc-form__input:hover{border:1px solid #854dff}.age-calc-form__error{opacity:0;grid-row:3/4;font-size:1.1rem;text-align:center;color:#ff5757;visibility:hidden}.age-calc-form__error--active{opacity:1}.age-calc-form__error--active .age-calc-form__input{border:1px solid #ff5757!important}.age-calc-form__submit-btn{aspect-ratio:1/1;position:absolute;top:100%;left:50%;width:50px;background-color:#854dff;border:none;border-radius:50%;outline:none;transform:translate(-50%,-50%);transition:background-color .3s;cursor:pointer}.age-calc-form__submit-btn:focus,.age-calc-form__submit-btn:hover{background-color:#141414}.age-calc-form__submit-btn-img{transform:scale(.5)}.age-calc-output{display:flex;flex-direction:column;margin-top:1em;font-size:4rem}.age-calc-output__text{font-weight:bolder;font-style:italic}.age-calc-output__text--highlighted{color:#854dff}.attribution{position:absolute;bottom:1.5em;font-size:1.2rem;text-align:center}.attribution a{color:#3e52a3;text-decoration:none;transition:color .3s}.attribution a:hover{color:#760ca7}
-/*# sourceMappingURL=data:application/json;charset=utf8;base64, */
